```{r}
`%not in%` <- Negate(`%in%`)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
nletters <- nletters
words_for_wordle_df <-
  words::words %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  filter(word_length == nletters) %>%
  mutate(uniq_characters = str_split(word, ""),
         uniq_characters = map_int(uniq_characters, function(x) length(unique(x))),
         starters = word_length == uniq_characters) 
```
